synopsis.text: Set in the picturesque Ishikawa Prefecture, this captivating anime unfolds the tale of Kanata Asaya, an enthusiastic high school student with a deep passion for crafting music videos. One day, Kanata stumbles upon a mesmerizing street performance by Yuu Orie, a local teacher who has abandoned her dreams of a music career. Inspired by the raw emotion and power of Yuu's song, Kanata becomes determined to create a music video that showcases her incredible talent, reigniting Yuu's passion for music along the way. Join Kanata and Yuu as they embark on a heartwarming journey of self-discovery, musical expression, and the unbreakable bond formed through the power of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
